name: Gaitoraid
tagline: Usage of gait information to establish identity of a person in traffic cameras
body:
### Welcome to Gaitoraid
Gaitoraid is an open source image processing algorithm developed mainly for use in traffic cameras and identifying people through their gait information.

Fork our repo and contribute to it.
```
$ git clone https://github.com/sgang007/gaitoraid
```


### Approaches to be tried
We have two approaches in mind.
1. Variational Approximation on Bayesian Inference to match the model with the existing database.
2. Usage of ANNs to do Deep Learning on training images and learning gait information.

### Initial Abstract
Follow our abstract given in this doc: [Research Proposal](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uqx0MPoKnpuhDdmuxCY-YuHza-Hx7sZAX9lJiBGvwzs/edit?usp=sharing)

### Authors and Contributors
The main work is done by Antariksh Kar (@AntarikshaKar) and Shubhojyoti Ganguly(@sgang007)
